properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Port Aransas to Matagorda Ship Channel out 20 NM; Bays and Waterways from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas; Bays and Waterways from Port Aransas to Port O'Connor; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Aransas out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 18 at 8:52PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi TX
properties.description:
Moist onshore flow over the relatively cooler shelf waters will
lead to patchy to areas of sea fog through Wednesday morning.
Visibilities will generally range from 2 to 4 nautical miles, with
patchy dense fog of 1 nautical mile or less at times in bays and
nearshore waters.

Mariners over the Bay Waters and over the Nearshore Coastal
Waters within 20 nautical miles offshore are urged to prepare for
rapidly changing visibilities. Visibilities are expected to
improve Wednesday morning in wake of a cold front.

NWSheadline: PATCHY TO AREAS OF SEA FOG EXPECTED TONIGHT THROUGH EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING
